docs.snippet: Kendrick Payne, a former defensive lineman in college at California, watched the O’Bannon case unfold a few miles from where he works as a driver for a ride-sharing company....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kendrick Payne, a former defensive lineman in college at California, watched the O’Bannon case unfold a few miles from where he works as a driver for a ride-sharing company.
docs.abstract: Kendrick Payne, former defensive lineman at Cal, is paying close attention to the Ed O’Bannon case against the NCAA; O’Bannon, and other college athletes have sued the NCAA for not allowing them to be paid for their names and images; an unequivocal supporter of the case, Payne recalls a college football career that was exhilarating and frustrating in equal measure.

headline.main: After the Game, Reality Sinks In for a Lineman
headline.print_headline: After the Game, Reality Sinks in for a Lineman
